reviews.title: Nice, cozy restaurant, friendly and good grub!
reviews.text: This hotel restaurant does its job well - don't expect a fine dining experience, but the meals are good, basic food that is more than adequate in quality and offer good value for money. Service is very friendly, and we were made to feel welcome here. They were also able to accomodate our group on a short notice, and all worked out well.
The bar food menu is short and traditional. There were a lot of staff around, and the cheerful service took twenty minutes.
reviews.title: Beware the burger!
You'll be well looked after here.
reviews.text: The large burger was hand made and quite tasty, but had a hint of pink in the centre. Personally, I'm happy to take the risk this entails for a jucier product, but every food safety guide states that minced meat must be cooked thoroughly.
The chicken Maryland was large too, but almost tasteless. The accompanying chips and salad were fine.
reviews.title: excellent steak meal

reviews.text: The above dishes and two drinks came to just under 39 euros. Quite expensive for simple bar food.
reviews.title: Perfect location for lunch/dinner.
